author: mratsim
content:
When looking into ARM, on most ARM multiplication cost 3x addition, except on Apple see https://github.com/mratsim/constantine/issues/200#issuecomment-1937901275

So you need Karatsuba multiplication for field as large as BLS12-381.

author: jtraglia
content: That's quite interesting. The image with the big url doesn't exist btw. But this isn't the issue we're having exactly. I think the ampere altra's single core performance is just really bad for some reason. Or maybe related to the cpu having so many cores, up to 80. I can look more into this today.

content: the image is the one that appears below

author: kedieo
content: Hey there! Is there any difference querying blob transactions to normal transactions (like transfer and contract txs)? And is there a way of querying all blob transactions related to a rollup? Like namespaces on Celestia.

author: tristan_wilson
content: not sure how other rollups are doing it, but for Arbitrum you would need to look for txs to the sequencer inbox contract
